entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
